name: Abyss Shocker
tooltip: Fires an erratic lightning bolt that arcs and bounces between enemies

name: Abyssal Tome
tooltip: Casts a slow-moving ball of dark energy

name: Acid Gun
tooltip: Releases three streams of acid

name: Aergian Technistaff
tooltip: Summons an orbital Aergia Neuron
Holding right click causes the orbit to accelerate
Once fully charged, the ring can be thrown to chase enemies

name: Aero Bolt
tooltip: Casts a slow-moving mini hurricanes

name: Aether's Whisper
tooltip: Inflicts long-lasting shadowflame and splits on tile hits
Projectiles gain damage as they travel
Right click to change from magic to ranged damage
Right click consumes no mana

name: Aetherflux Cannon
tooltip: Fires a barrage of phased god rays that pass through terrain

name: Alpha Ray
tooltip: Disintegrates everything with a tri-beam of energy and lasers
Right click to fire a Y-shaped beam of destructive energy and a spread of lasers

name: Alula Australis
tooltip: Fires a beautiful aurora trailed by a star shower

name: Anahita's Arpeggio
tooltip: Casts slow-moving treble clefs that confuse enemies

name: Apoctosis Array
tooltip: Fires ion blasts that speed up and then explode
Damage scales with how full your mana is
Using Astral Injection reduces the effectiveness of the mana boost

name: Apotheosis
tooltip: Eat worms
Unleashes interdimensional projection magic

name: Aquamarine Staff
tooltip: Shoots two blue bolts

name: Arch Amaryllis
tooltip: Casts a beaming flower that explodes into homing petals

name: Arctic Bear Paw
tooltip: The savage mauling that fits in your pocket
Fires spiritual claws that ignore walls and confuse enemies

name: Art Attack
tooltip: Casts a star that follows the mouse that creates a rainbow trail as it moves
Once a full shape is created with the trail all enemies within it take damage proportional to how long it took to draw the shape
And the audience goes wild!

tooltip: Summons asteroids from the sky

tooltip: Casts aquatic spears that split as they travel

name: Augur of the Elements
tooltip: Casts a burst of elemental tentacles to spear your enemies

name: Eidolon Staff
tooltip: The power of an ancient cultist resonates within this staff
Fires a spread of ancient light and has a chance to fire a spinning ice cluster
Summons a Juvenile Eidolon Wyrm to fight for you which takes up 4 minion slots
Right click to fire out Ice Clusters
When an Ice Cluster intersects with the Wyrm, it explodes into homing icicles
Only one wyrm can exist at a time

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

name: Eldritch Tome
tooltip: Casts eldritch tentacles to spear your enemies

name: Elemental Ray
tooltip: Casts four celestial beams near the player
Solar beams explode on enemy hits
Nebula beams sweeps a little bit over time
Vortex beams act like fast lightning and electrify enemies on hit
Stardust beams release small stars that home on enemy hits

name: Eternity
tooltip: There's pictures of ponies in the book

name: Event Horizon
tooltip: Nothing, not even light, can return.
Fires a ring of stars to home in on nearby enemies
Stars spawn black holes on enemy hits

name: Everglade Spray
tooltip: Fires a stream of burning green ichor

name: Fabstaff

tooltip: Spawns ghostly fireballs that follow the player

Fires a devastating high velocity blast with extreme knockback
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Genisis
tooltip: Fires a Y-shaped beam of destructive energy and a spread of lasers

name: Ghastly Visage
tooltip: Fires homing ghast energy that explodes

name: Gleaming Magnolia
tooltip: Casts a gleaming flower that explodes into petals

name: Glorious End
tooltip: Casts a meteor star for the player to ride in the direction of the cursor
The meteor star explodes after hitting an enemy, crashing into a wall, or after 6 seconds
This explosion hurts both enemies and the player
Releasing the cursor before the star explodes will cause it to explode prematurely for less damage
Mounts are disabled while this weapon is in use

name: Gruesome Eminence
tooltip: The spirits of the amalgam could never pass on to their desired afterlife,
Tainted and melded by rage as they were.

name: Hadal Urn
tooltip: Fires a random assortment of ocean creatures
'There's no telling how long it was down there... or what lurks inside'

name: Hadopelagic Echo
tooltip: Fires a string of bouncing sound waves that become stronger as they travel
Sound waves echo additional sound waves on enemy hits

name: Harvest Staff
tooltip: Casts flaming pumpkins

name: Helium Flash

Launches volatile star cores which erupt into colossal fusion blasts

name: Hell Burst
tooltip: Casts a beam of flame

name: Hellwing Staff
tooltip: Casts flaming bats

name: Hematemesis
tooltip: Casts a barrage of blood geysers from below

name: Heresy
tooltip: Releases fire and souls upward from a held book
As the book is held the power of both increases

name: Hyphae Rod
tooltip: Creates mushroom spores near the player

name: Ice Barrage
tooltip: Oh dear, you are dead!
Casts a deadly and powerful ice spell in the location of the cursor
This ice spell locks itself to the position of nearby enemies
Consumes 2 Blood Runes every time it's used

name: Nuclear Fury
tooltip: Casts a torrent of cosmic typhoons

name: Omega Ray

name: Parasitic Scepter

name: Plasmaflash Bolt

name: Poseidon

name: Primordial Ancient

name: Primordial Earth
tooltip: Casts a large blast of dust

name: Pulse Pistol
tooltip: Fires a pulse that arcs to a new target on enemy hits

name: Purge Guzzler

name: Rainbow Party Cannon

name: Ram's Revenge

name: Rancor

If the recipient has not yet forgiven themselves.

name: Storm Spray

Nearby enemies are sucked into the vortex and are attacked by a flurry of exo tentacles

name: Tears of Heaven
tooltip: Casts slow-moving homing balls of heavenly light

name: Terra Ray
tooltip: Casts an energy ray that splits into energy on enemies hits
More energy is created the farther along the ray the enemy hit is

name: Tesla Cannon
tooltip: Lightweight energy cannon that blasts an intense electrical beam that explodes
Beams can arc to nearby targets
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: The Dance of Light
tooltip: Barrages enemies with a hailstorm of Light Blades
'And in a flash of light, nothing remains'

name: The Prince
tooltip: Casts a holy fireball that explodes into 6 flames
So you're telling me that the prince exploded, and then turned into a flower?
-Dain, the sailor druid

name: The Swarmer

or split into energy orbs
